description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人。现任中共中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记、中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a national-level leader. He is currently a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee, a secretary of the Central Secretariat, and the head of the CCP Central Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician who has been the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局委员

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局委员

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局的成员，是中国共产党的高级领导人。
description.en: Members of the Politburo of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, who are senior leaders of the CCP.

en: Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管意识形态方面工作的综合职能部门。
description.en: A functional department of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party in charge of ideology-related work.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who previously served as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所顶尖公立研究型大学。
description.en: A major public research university in Beijing, China.

en: Party and state leaders of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治术语，是对在中国共产党和中华人民共和国政府担任最高级别职务人员的统称。
description.en: A political term in the People's Republic of China referring to top officials holding the highest positions in the Chinese Communist Party and the government.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body for the Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party and its Standing Committee.

en: Central Party School of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的机构，是中国共产党培养党的高中级领导干部和马克思主义理论干部的最高学府。
description.en: An institution under the direct authority of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, serving as the highest academy for training high- and middle-ranking party officials and Marxist theorists.

description.zh-cn: 北京大学下属院系，后发展为北京大学信息管理系。
description.en: A department of Peking University, which later evolved into the Department of Information Management.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代文学研究专家，北京大学中文系教授。
description.en: An expert in modern Chinese literature and a professor at the Department of Chinese Language and Literature, Peking University.

description.en: A graduate school of Harvard University focusing on public policy, public administration, and international development.

description.en: An institution directly under the CCDI and the National Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会召开的首次全体会议，选举产生了新一届中央领导机构。
description.en: The first plenary session of the 20th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, which elected the new central leadership.

description.zh-cn: 唐代伟大的现实主义诗人。
description.en: A renowned Chinese poet of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 一种对中国共产党一些文章和讲话中存在的空洞、公式化、脱离实际的文风的批评性称谓。
description.en: A critical term for a style of writing in some CCP articles and speeches characterized by empty, formulaic, and impractical content.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央宣传部常务副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who previously served as the Executive Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央宣传部常务副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who previously served as the Executive Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央党校常务副校长。
description.en: Chinese politician who previously served as the Executive Vice President of the Central Party School.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央党校常务副校长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Executive Vice President of the Central Party School.

description.en: Chinese politician who previously served as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Fujian Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共福建省委宣传部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who previously served as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Fujian Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院直属事业单位，与中共中央党校一个机构两块牌子。
description.en: An institution directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which operates under one institution with two names alongside the Central Party School.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国纪检监察学院院长。
description.en: Chinese politician who previously served as the President of the China Academy of Discipline Inspection and Supervision.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局委员

description.zh-cn: 根据党内排名，担任中共中央政治局委员的李书磊是中共中央总书记习近平的下属。
description.en: According to the party hierarchy, Li Shulei, as a member of the Politburo, is a subordinate of General Secretary Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊接替黄坤明担任中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: Li Shulei succeeded Huang Kunming as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊先后在北京大学获得图书馆学学士、中国现代文学硕士和博士学位。
description.en: Li Shulei obtained his bachelor's degree in library science, and master's and doctoral degrees in modern Chinese literature from Peking University.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央书记处
中国共产党福建省委员会
中国共产党福建省委员会宣传部
中国共产党北京市委员会
中国共产党北京市纪律检查委员会
中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 李书磊在北京大学攻读博士学位期间的导师是严家炎。
description.en: Yan Jiayan was Li Shulei's doctoral advisor at Peking University.

relationships.target: 哈佛大学肯尼迪政府学院

description.zh-cn: 参加了“高级行政人员班”培训项目。
description.en: Participated in the 'Senior Executive Fellows program'.

relationships.target: 中共青龙满族自治县委员会

position.en: Deputy Secretary of the County Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 赴地方挂职锻炼。
description.en: Temporarily assigned to a local post for practical experience.

description.zh-cn: 赴地方挂职锻炼。
description.en: Temporarily assigned to a local post for practical experience.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊担任中共中央党校副校长期间，习近平是时任校长。
description.en: When Li Shulei served as Vice President of the Central Party School, Xi Jinping was the President.

description.zh-cn: 在中央党校共事期间，李书磊受到时任校长习近平的赏识，为其后续的政治晋升奠定了基础。
description.en: During their time working together at the Central Party School, Li Shulei was appreciated by then-President Xi Jinping, which laid the foundation for his subsequent political advancement.

description.zh-cn: 担任福建省委宣传部长期间，亲自倡议、策划并修改了《福建日报》上关于习近平福建工作往事的三万余字系列报道，旨在宣传习近平的执政理念和经历。
description.en: While serving as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the Fujian Provincial Party Committee, he personally initiated, planned, and edited a series of reports in the Fujian Daily totaling over 30,000 words about Xi Jinping's past work in Fujian, aiming to promote Xi's governing philosophy and experience.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊接替叶青纯担任中共北京市委常委、市纪委书记。
description.en: Li Shulei succeeded Ye Qingchun as a member of the Standing Committee of the CCP Beijing Municipal Committee and Secretary of the Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 张硕辅接替李书磊担任中共北京市委常委、市纪委书记。
description.en: Zhang Shuofu succeeded Li Shulei as a member of the Standing Committee of the CCP Beijing Municipal Committee and Secretary of the Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十八届中央纪律检查委员会
中央反腐败协调小组国际追逃追赃工作办公室
中华人民共和国国家监察委员会

position.en: Deputy Director, Secretary of the Organ Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 李书磊于2020年7月当选机关党委书记，并于2020年12月26日卸任国家监委副主任职务。
description.en: Li Shulei was elected Secretary of the Organ Party Committee in July 2020 and resigned from his position as Deputy Director of the National Supervisory Commission on December 26, 2020.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会第一次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在中共二十届一中全会上，李书磊当选为中共中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记，晋升副国级。
description.en: At the First Plenary Session of the 20th CCP Central Committee, Li Shulei was elected a member of the Politburo and a secretary of the Central Secretariat, being promoted to the deputy national level.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊表示最敬佩的人是唐代诗人白居易。
description.en: Li Shulei stated that the person he admires most is the Tang dynasty poet Bai Juyi.

description.zh-cn: 发表论文《再造语言》，系统性地研究和批判了“党八股”文风，倡导改善语言。
description.en: Published the paper 'Recreating Language', which systematically studied and criticized the 'stereotyped Party writing' style and advocated for language improvement.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊接替王晓晖担任中共中央宣传部常务副部长。
description.en: Li Shulei succeeded Wang Xiaohui as the Executive Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 胡和平接替李书磊担任中共中央宣传部常务副部长。
description.en: Hu Heping succeeded Li Shulei as the Executive Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊接替何毅亭担任中共中央党校（国家行政学院）常务副校（院）长。
description.en: Li Shulei succeeded He Yiting as the Executive Vice President of the Central Party School (Chinese Academy of Governance).

description.zh-cn: 谢春涛接替李书磊担任中共中央党校（国家行政学院）常务副校（院）长。
description.en: Xie Chuntao succeeded Li Shulei as the Executive Vice President of the Central Party School (Chinese Academy of Governance).

description.zh-cn: 李书磊接替袁荣祥担任中共福建省委宣传部部长。
description.en: Li Shulei succeeded Yuan Rongxiang as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Fujian Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 高翔接替李书磊担任中共福建省委宣传部部长。
description.en: Gao Xiang succeeded Li Shulei as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Fujian Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊接替杨晓渡担任中国纪检监察学院院长。
description.en: Li Shulei succeeded Yang Xiaodu as the President of the China Academy of Discipline Inspection and Supervision.

description.zh-cn: 杨晓渡接替李书磊担任中国纪检监察学院院长。
description.en: Yang Xiaodu succeeded Li Shulei as the President of the China Academy of Discipline Inspection and Supervision.
